title: London/Westminster
name: Westminster Abbey
hours: Abbey admission: M Tu, Th F 09:30-15:45, W 09:30-19:00, Sa 09:30-13:45 (extended in summer to 15:45), Su open for worship only, the Abbey closes 1 hr after last admission; Chapter House admission: 10:30-16:00 daily; Westminster Abbey Museum: 10:30-16:00 daily; Pyx Chamber: 10:30-16:00 daily; Cloisters: 08:00-18:00 daily
price: £12, concessions £6 (seniors 60+, children 11-16, students with full-time student card), family ticket £18 (two adults and two children under 18), children under 11 free (maximum of two children per paying adult)
content: Note that the Abbey itself charges tourists for entry, but not for worshippers. Attend a church service for free and enjoy some of the finest choral music in London from the choir. Evensong at 4PM or 5PM, depending on time of year, is an especially good bet. The Abbey is the traditional scene for the Coronation of British monarchs and the burial place of many past kings and queens. | image=Westminster Abbey West Door.jpg
